title: Is there a way to get higher resolution pictures coming from other devices such as apple?
content:
SMS messages are automatically compressed, is there a way to get the same resolution photos shared with me from my family on Apple products without using google photos or other photo sharing apps? 

This issue is important and will be a deciding factor on whether or not I upgrade to another google device or return to Apple (as they can see mine at HD quality but all I get are pixelated photos from ios users).
